project.name: BEEEDBuildTEI
project.description:
##################################################################### # # Project build file 2025 by Martin Holmes (mholmes@uvic.ca) Navarra Houldin
This build file will accomplish these basic tasks:
1. Transform the source Endnote XML into a collection of TEI XML files. 2. Validate the generated files against the project schemas (RNG and Schematron).
To run, type:
ant -f buildTEI.xml
at the command line. The results will appear in the /tei/ folder. # # #####################################################################

target.name: preClean
target.description: TARGET preClean This cleans up any detritus from previous builds.

echo.message: Cleaning up everything in the TEI folder and temporary folder...

target.name: generateTEI
target.description: TARGET generateTEI This processes the Endnote XML to generate a collection of TEI files in the tei folder.

target.name: validateTEI
target.description: TARGET validateTEI This validates the generated TEI with RNG and Schematron.

target.name: all
target.description: TARGET all This runs the complete conversion process from Endnote to TEI, and validates the results.
